# maximumMessageSize

**Instance Property**

The maximum allowed message size, in bytes, to be received by the WebSocket connection.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumMessageSize: Int { get set }
```

## Configuring WebSocket Options

- **init(_:)**: Initializes a default set of WebSocket connection options.
- **NWProtocolWebSocket.Version**: Supported versions of the WebSocket protocol.
- **autoReplyPing**: A Boolean indicating whether the connection automatically replies to Ping messages instead of delivering them to you.
